content: Hi everyone, Jetstream2 is doing maintenance Sunday 4/16 from 8AM-6PM EDT, and all CPU-based hosts will be offline. This will affect the instance which provides our Binderhub service. Once I get notified that the maintenance is complete, I will power back on the instance and spin back up the Kubernetes pods that make Binderhub work.
The maintenance has completed and I have restarted the relevant instances. The BinderHub service should be working as normal now.
